ABOUT ME
Matt Wagar
A Game Developer with experience in Technical Art, Mixed Reality Production (AR / VR), and UI Development, Matt Wagar has just graduated from Drexel University in June 2019. He graduated with a B.S. in Computer Science, a concentration in Game Design, a minor in Animation and Visual Effects, and a minor in Virtual Reality and Immersive Media. Matt Wagar is familiar with many aspects of the game development pipeline and is most excited by any chance to bridge code and art.
